channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Lenovo Notebook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Lenovo Notebook

item.title: CVE-2023-4028|2024-10-08T13:50:36.650Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20notebook
item.description: A buffer overflow has been identified in the SystemUserMasterHddPwdDxe driver in some Lenovo Notebook products which may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
